Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 2 Cūḷantaraduka » 2.5 Rūpīduka » 2.5.7 Pañhāvāra » 2.5.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 2.5.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Indriya
Cūḷantaraduka
Rūpīduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Indriya
122.
822Rūpī dhammo rūpissa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—  rūpajīvitindriyaṃ kaṭattārūpānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)
823Rūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—  cakkhundriyaṃ…pe…  kāyindriyaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa indriyapaccayena paccayo. (2)
824Arūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
825Rūpī ca arūpī ca dhammā arūpissa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—  cakkhundriyañca cakkhuviññāṇañca cakkhuviññāṇasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo…pe…  kāyindriyañca…pe… .
<< Vipākāhāraup Jhānādi >>
